alert.note: Alert for Milwaukee; Racine (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 05 at 12:32PM CDT until November 05 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 PM CDT FOR MILWAUKEE AND NORTHEASTERN RACINE COUNTIES... At 1231 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Milwaukee to Racine, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Milwaukee, Racine, West Allis, Wauwatosa, Greenfield, Oak Creek, Mount Pleasant, South Milwaukee, Cudahy, Whitefish Bay, Greendale, Brown Deer, St. Francis, Sturtevant, Fox Point, Bayside, West Milwaukee, Glendale, Franklin and Wind Point. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
